p: Due to its long half-life, AZM accumulates over time, but to achieve a rapid effect, we will use 500 mg OD for 14 days, similar to the dose recommended in UK for treatment of Lyme disease [ 47]. This dose is selected to be known to be well-tolerated and of sufficient duration to cover the period during which progression from moderate to severe disease may occur and during which anti-inflammatory effects may be most beneficial.
